name: EnviroGolf (itch)
description:
Envi­roGolf: An An envi­ron­men­tally savvy text-based golf game.

"To be hon­est, I wasn't much of a fan of golf before play­ing Envi­roGolf, but now? Huh, I hate golf! Prob­a­bly." — Indi­eS­ta­tik

"Finally, A Game That Makes You Feel Ter­ri­ble About Lik­ing Golf" — Kotaku

Fea­tured on Indie-Impressions
Dis­played at Dif­fer­ent Games
Part of IndieStatik's Indie Games Mix­tape: Sweaty Sum­mer Sen­sa­tions
Men­tioned on Kit­guru

Game 29 of 100 in 5 years
